channel.title: LFT - Programmer
channel.description:
Hi, I'm looking for a team to get me some more experience in game development.
Some of my skills: PHP C# C++ Java JavaScript (pro)
Experienced in: Web development Network development Cloud development Async programming Mutli-thread programming Game and simulation physics 2D and 3D graphic development Graphic rendering and shader development Web and system security
